publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5175 Fiona Hyslop: Schools Consultation (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Schools Consultation (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Keith Brown*
S3M-5175 Fiona Hyslop: Schools (Consultation) (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Schools Consultation (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Keith Brown
